nodes.text: Ember was a female charhound owned by the Jedi Padawan Bell Zettifar during the time of the High Republic. Ember accompanied Zettifar while he was stationed at the Jedi outpost on the ore planet of Elphrona, often wandering the world's iron hills. She was friendly with all of the Jedi stationed at the outpost, namely Indeera Stokes and Porter Engle. When the Jedi chased a group of Nihil who had captured the Blythe family from their home, Ember accompanied them and killed one of the marauders at an opportune moment, saving Engle's life.
